title: Coming Consumed
description: Karma is a vengeful witch.Sydney knows firsthand what can happen when lies catch up to you. Just when she believes she has a handle on her life, a mysterious man waltzes into her bakery and turns her world upside down. Behind the beard and silver eyes, Sydney knows heâ€™s hiding something. Unfortunately, karma is one step behind him.As an undercover agent, Dylan lives his life by strict codes and calculations and he knows he is in trouble the first time he lays eyes on Sydney. One wrong move can put her in danger, but something about her draws him in and that may prove to be the biggest risk he has ever taken.
author: Renee Harless
